Instruction: 'Prepare the potatoes by peeling and grating them as in the previous recipes.'
'Place the grated potatoes in a clean kitchen towel and squeeze out excess moisture.'
'Transfer the grated potatoes to a bowl and season with salt and black pepper.'
'Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.'
Add the diced bell pepper and onion to the skillet and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.'
'Add the sliced mushrooms to the skillet and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.'
'Transfer the cooked vegetables to a plate and set aside.'
In the same skillet, add a bit more oil if needed, then add the grated potatoes, spreading them out evenly.'
Cook the hash browns for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy.'
Once cooked, add the cooked vegetables back to the skillet with the hash browns and mix gently.'
'Serve hot and enjoy these flavorful veggie hash browns!'
